short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn any athlete's TFRRS profile into an interactive graph

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a Track and Field fan? Do you find yourself scouring over TFRRS results? Well then, this browser extension is for you! 

With ‘Chiphoagie TFRRS Graph’ you can experience TFRRS.org in a whole new way. As soon as you download the extension, you will be able to visit any athlete's TFRRS profile and see an interactive performance graph. We clean, sort, and chart an athlete’s performance data so you don't have to.

Chiphoagie is a team of athletes building software tools that improve the coverage of our favorite sport. We believe data should be fun, interactive, and visual.

The extension is completely free to use and we do not track any of your information. All we ask from you is feedback!

What can we build that will improve your track and field or cross-country experience? Visit our website to vote on our next project and if you have an idea for a new project please reach out!
